attributes.additional_details: The cost of living is now getting to a breaking point for everyone having to choose between eating or heating Zero hour contracts do not give us guaranteed income and the DWP unfortunately work in arears leaving people with no money with hours rising and dropping
attributes.background: Stop Zero Hour Contracts And Have Safe jobs For employees as the cost of living sores

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/614439
